title: Cultural Context-based Statistical Data Distribution Measurement Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic statistical terminology and data collection methodologies
context.additional_context: A data literacy enhancement course for employees to improve workplace efficiency, emphasizing analytical skills for everyday and job-related data.

learning_goals: Learners can conduct data collection and visualization activities utilizing cultural contexts in mobile environments.
Learners can calculate and interpret data distribution metrics—such as mean, variance, and standard deviation—based on real-world work cases.
Learners can present data analysis results through team collaboration and apply them to decision-making processes via project-based assessments.

resources: PMRI Instructional Method Application Video Materials

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
